queryList.title: Select a domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.name =~ {name} WITH n MATCH p=(n)<-[r:MemberOf*1..]-(m) RETURN p

queries.name: Find Shortest Paths to Domain Admins

queryList.title: Select a Domain Admin group...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.name =~ {name} RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p=(a:Computer)-[r:HasSession]->(b:User) WITH a,b,r MATCH p=shortestPath((b)-[:AdminTo|MemberOf*1..]->(a)) RETURN p

queries.name: Top Ten Users with Most Sessions

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User),(m:Computer), (n)<-[r:HasSession]-(m) WHERE NOT n.name STARTS WITH 'ANONYMOUS LOGON' AND NOT n.name='' WITH n, count(r) as rel_count order by rel_count desc LIMIT 10 MATCH p=(m)-[r:HasSession]->(n) RETURN p

queries.name: Top Ten Computers with Most Sessions

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User),(m:Computer), (n)<-[r:HasSession]-(m) WHERE NOT n.name STARTS WITH 'ANONYMOUS LOGON' AND NOT n.name='' WITH m, count(r) as rel_count order by rel_count desc LIMIT 10 MATCH p=(m)-[r:HasSession]->(n) RETURN n,r,m

queries.name: Top Ten Users with Most Local Admin Rights

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User),(m:Computer), (n)-[r:AdminTo]->(m) WHERE NOT n.name STARTS WITH 'ANONYMOUS LOGON' AND NOT n.name='' WITH n, count(r) as rel_count order by rel_count desc LIMIT 10 MATCH p=(m)<-[r:AdminTo]-(n) RETURN p

queries.name: Top Ten Computers with Most Admins

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User),(m:Computer), (n)-[r:AdminTo]->(m) WHERE NOT n.name STARTS WITH 'ANONYMOUS LOGON' AND NOT n.name='' WITH m, count(r) as rel_count order by rel_count desc LIMIT 10 MATCH p=(m)<-[r:AdminTo]-(n) RETURN p

queries.name: Users with Foreign Domain Group Membership New

queryList.title: Select source domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH (n:User) WITH n MATCH (m:Group) WITH n,m MATCH p=(n)-[r:MemberOf]->(m) WHERE n.domain={result} AND NOT m.domain=n.domain RETURN p

queries.name: Groups with Foreign Domain Group Membership New

queryList.title: Select source domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH (n:Group) WITH n MATCH (m:Group) WITH n,m MATCH p=(n)-[r:MemberOf]->(m) WHERE n.domain={result} AND NOT m.domain=n.domain AND NOT n.name=m.name RETURN p

queryList.title: Select a domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC

queryList.title: Select a user with an SPN
queryList.query: MATCH (n:User) WHERE n.domain={result} AND n.HasSPN=true RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.PwdLastSet DESC
